content.description: Julio sells computers at an electronics store. Let the random variable <math alttext="uppercase C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> represent the number of computers that Julio sells in one week. The following table shows the probability distribution of <math alttext="uppercase C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
